title: Foreigners buy US$9.1mn worth Sri Lanka rupee bonds
byline: Sri Lanka has enjoyed $19.2 million inflows into the rupee bonds in last three weeks

title: IMF's Gita Gopinath to visit Sri Lanka amid recovery from first default
byline: Will address conference on Sri Lanka's Road to Recovery

title: Sri Lanka's Colombo Dockyard builds Maldives underwater restaurants
byline: Colombo Dockyard had built two under water restaurants in 2025 and towed them to the Maldives
